channel.title: (PI) How to Make Certain Areas PvP?
channel.description:
Hello
I have a PI server and I want to know how I can make certain areas PvP.
I want this area to be pvp: From: X: 3269 Y: 2820
To: X: 3290 Y: 2811
I know it has to be in a square, so I already mapped out where I wanted it to be, I just don't know how to add it in.

item.title: (PI) How to Make Certain Areas PvP?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Hyperon, post:3, topic:548307”]If you search the project for “inArea” or something like that you will find an existing area. Wilderness is a common one, search all instances of that and copy it.

I don’t know PI. If you use an IDE though you can search every file at the same time.[/quote]
It’d be in the Player class…
OP:
Basically it’s this:

public static boolean inArea() { return absX > 0 && absX < 10 && absY > 0 && absY < 10); }
If the player has an x of 1-9 and y of 1-9 this will return true.

You could add the equals sign to make it include the 0 and 10…

Read full topic
item.source: (PI) How to Make Certain Areas PvP?

item.title: (PI) How to Make Certain Areas PvP?
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

If you search the project for “inArea” or something like that you will find an existing area. Wilderness is a common one, search all instances of that and copy it.

I don’t know PI. If you use an IDE though you can search every file at the same time.

Read full topic
